name: 10 Second Run
description:
"10 Second Run" , popular on Nintendo Switch and DS, has been totally redeveloped for smartphone app!
In 10 Seconds Run,, player will lead the stick person to the goal in 10 seconds, by swiping, tapping and holding on the screen. There is no item to power up, speed up or getting more seconds. Your skill and keen eye to find shortcut are the key to complete all the stages!


Key features
* Play with simple swiping, tapping and holding.
* You can play all the 50 stages at the beginning.
* Nice BGM
* Instant Death in very challenging stages
* Great for your short break!
* Very fun!
